# Example of plotly

We're gonna look at NY NOAA data.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
nynoaadat <- read_csv("nynoaadat.csv")
```

# Plotly Plots

## Precipitation Over Time
```{r}
precip_plot <- nynoaadat |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~date, 
    y = ~prcp, 
    type = "scatter", 
    mode = "lines",
    line = list(color = "blue")
  )
precip_plot
```

## Snowfall by Date
```{r}
# Bar plot for snowfall
snowfall_plot <- nynoaadat |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~date, 
    y = ~snow, 
    type = "bar",
    marker = list(color = "lightblue")
  )
snowfall_plot
```

## Temperature Distribution
```{r}
temp_plot <- nynoaadat |> 
  plot_ly(
    y = ~tmax, 
    type = "box",
    boxpoints = "all", 
    jitter = 0.3,      
    pointpos = -1.8,
    marker = list(color = "orange")
  ) 
temp_plot
```
